name: IronClaw Secret Request
description: Agent detects missing credentials and creates structured secret-request issues on remote-juggler
process: Attempt to resolve expected credentials via juggler_resolve_composite()
For each resolution failure, create a GitHub issue with secret-request label
Use juggler_request_secret(name, reason, urgency) for structured requests
Log request details to audit trail
Report: which credentials are missing, issues created, urgency levels
